Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Amazing noodles and side dishes. Would advice to come more than once so you can try everything (I'm already looking forward to my next visit)

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Great noodles. If you like indonesian food you should like this noodle as well. Various indonesian food menu served as well as appetizer such as tahu and otak otak. Affordable price too!

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Awesome Indonesian eat place. Super yummy!!! Best mie ayam/bakmi I ever had in Amsterdam, taste very authentic, the noodles is homemade and the pangsit is perfect!! Love it üòä

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Best noodles i ever ate

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: When we entered the snackbar it looked promising. It was full and there were many indonesians eating inside. We got a bit disappointed when the food arrived. We felt like stinking rich smurfs. We paid the jackpot of ‚Ç¨9 for a small cup of ‚Ä¶

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Delicious noodles, very recommended for people who find Indonesian food. The owner also very humble and nice. Good place.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text:
I tried the hot noodles with a mix of everything just to see which was my favourite.
I really enjoyed the mushrooms and the dumplings.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: The best Indonesian Bakmi in the Netherlands.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Very authentic Indonesian noodle shop, with a very friendly chef.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Extra delicious original chinese style noodle. Bakso (meatballs) & pangsit are totally recommended.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Legit tasting asian noodles. Will be back for sure. Good drink but remember to ask for less sugar

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Delicious indonesian chicken noodles. The noodle tastes very traditional. I am Indonesian and I love it!

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Delicous Mie Ayam.. Otak2 also must try and bakcang

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Great food and great service. Is recommend giving it a try for a quick lunch or dinner.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Nice Indo noodles. Very pleasant service. 3 stars for a bit sneaky question if I wanted tofu as an addition. I said yes why not and got one piece of nice tofu. When getting the bill I realized I was charged 4 EUROS FOR ONE PIECE OF TOFU. Sorry but that seems too much. I left with a ripped off feeling üòí

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Mie ayam rica rica very nice and the noodle also nice..the best noodle in Amsterdam lelylaan..

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: We came here because of the great reviews we read here but unfortunately we were disappointed. One of our meals came out of the microwave. The other one was okay but VERY small portions for the price!!! Not much chicken, tiny pieces of ‚Ä¶

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: My first visit @Arie Noodles and I love the food  . Mie kuping ba‚Äô is so delicious and bacang is so yummy.. enak! Great food and great service.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Before you read any further, here's a disclosure: the food isn't bad, but I have high expectations when it comes to food from my own country. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Food was great. Location is also easily reached by public transportation (tram/bus). If you come with private vehicle there is a parking garage underneath the building. Service was okay. One minor point is the payment can‚Äôt be done by card, they only accept cash payment.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: The best Indonesian noodles restaurant in Amsterdam. From the owner I know that the noodles are homemade, made by himself. Really yummy. You can choose noodles with chicken, meat ball (bakso), pangsit and even vegetarian noodles with tofu. I really recommend it.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: The noodle is homemade, and its tastes very good, the closest taste to indonesian noodles that one could ever get. They also have satay, fishcake, and some more indonesian dishes. But the place is a bit secluded, and its hard to get a taxy there.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Nice, fresh noodle soup, taste like home..

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Great value for money! Delicious fresh home made noodles and super friendly owner. ‚Ä¶

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Coincidently discovered this small, but nice restaurant. Very clean, friendly chef, fresh ingredients and super delicious noodles! Good price. Absolute recommended!

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: If you want Real Authentic Indonesian food... (or maybe even better?) you really should go to aries noodles. it's only a 10 min walk from the station Heemstedestraat (line 50) or take the tram for 1 stop. After the walking, You'll be ‚Ä¶

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Very nice authentic Indonesian noodles that are made in the restaurant. They also have imported Tehbotol! Can compare this to BakmiGM in Indonesia.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Had some delicious authentic Indonesian Noodles. The staff is super friendly. Will definitely come back.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Very tasty with a good-hearted and friendly chef! One or two pieces of chicken were a bit cold, but otherwise the food was great.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: The spicy noodles with chicken is really awesome!! They serve authentic  Indonesian food.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text:
Yummy noodle and the taste of their foods are so Asian. The location in the middle of big buildings, offices and apartments
Noted: pay cash only!

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Freshly prepared ingredients and noodles made from scratch justify the price. You get what you pay for. Very good.

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Yum! Freshly made! Super warm atmosphere. I love this place. And in the summer you can sit outside :)

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Highly Recommended Noodle Restaurant to Visit when you missed Indonesian Mie Ayam, Fresh Making Noodle en Prepare by Aries Him Self.. üëçüëçüëçüëç

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Small restaurant, huge compliment! Tasty, clean, friendly, affordable! I can only recommend it, if you stay nearby at a hotel and looking for something to eat!

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: The closest thing to the real authentic Indonesian noodle house in Europe! Only drawback is that there's just one. :) Thumbs up for Aries!

Name: Aries Noodles
Review Text: Delicious bakmi and friendly owner

Name: Aries Noodles

Review Text: Had the combo noodles. It came with soup and was very tasty. Owner was helpful and spoke English.
